travels.title: Fiji/Australia '15
travels.headertext: We visited Australia for our 20th Anniversay in November 2015. We stopped in Fiji on the way to Melbourne, then spend a few days along the Great Ocean before going on to Tasmania and then up to Heron Island on the Great Barrier Reef.

entry.text: The view from the hotel room in Fiji
Hobart, Tasmania, viewed from the top of Mt. Wellington
Tasmanian Devil at an Animal Sanctuary
Feeding the kangaroos at an Animal Sanctuary
Sugar Glider at an Animal Sanctuary
Heron Island on the Great Barrier Reef
Green Turtle that just finished laying her eggs and is starting back to the water on Heron Island
